title: Ece seniors plss
content: Has anybody ever scored a 10 sgpa in any of the Semesters i herd its hard to score in ece my chem sir was blasting our ears of about it is it really that hard to score a 9.6+ sgpa in ece?

comments.body: If you are able to keep your gap above 9 , you are among top 30
In our batch, only one person has scored 10 SGPA till now
Ohh which batch are u frm?
Which sem did they score a 10 sgpa btw??

Yeah one of my classmates only scored 10 in the first 2 sems. It is a bit hard after 3rd sem in ECE due to there being so many numericals where you can make mistakes but 9.5+ is definitely achievable. Highest I've seen after 3rd sem is a 9.92 in sem 5. But there's someone in RR campus ECE with a 9.8 cgpa so that person probably got 10 in a few sems
